name: Malware - The Game
description:
Malware Is A Game Made For The FennecJam...

This Game Is Connected To The Virus Connected Universe. To Understand More About The Story, Play Glitch. Once You Finish Malware, Play Virus To See The Game That Takes Place After This.

Ugh And Roses By Kawai Sprite                                                                                                                       All The Other Music Made By The Scratch Team.

Art By Me...

Enjoy :P

Glitch - Glitch - The Prequel To Virus by DeeTDM, Ripnet                                                                 Virus - Mr. virus by Ripnet (itch.io)
